author: Pulsar
title: If this isn't fun, I don't know what is!
review: This is an awesome game! It is very fun to build tracks and customise cars with tires and paint. My cousin and I have at least 10 custom tracks all that we've mastered. It's great when you finally beat the champion of the world: Mr.X!

author: Daniel__
title: Not bad...
review:
This game is an excellent little program that I have 2 bad things to say about:
1. It's too slow
2. It's only compatible with Windows 95 & 98.

Recently after I bought this, our computer updated to Windows XP and I couldn't play and that was a big bad problem that I couldn't fix. :D

author: jteisberg
title: A racing game you dont DRIVE in!?
review:
over all this IS a really fun game!  unlike in LEGO racers 1 and 2, you cant ACTUALLY BIULD your cars or minifigures.  however you can choose your charictor, choose your car, tires, and paint job!  one this this game has that LEGO racers doesnt is the face that you CAN BIULD the TRACKS!  its way fun!   One this that is a little wierd to get used to is the stearing.  You dont actually STEAR your car!   well kinda...  It stears for you,  however you will spin out if your going too fast so you need to have a good sence of when to speed up, and when to slow down.

+u can biuld tracks!
-u cant biuld minifigs...

i STILL give it a 5/5!

author: The_Dumb_One
title: What's the point?
review:
The main problem for me is: you don't drive. All I do is press the forward button and release it right before the turns.

 

The only reason this game gets 3/5 is because of the creator where you can have fun messing up the A.I.
